name: Cranberry Appetizer Meatballs (paper)
ingredients: 50 frozen meatballs (traditional or plain preferred or Italian)
3/4 cups whole berry cranberry sauce (half can)
instructions: Place the frozen meatballs in slow cooker.
Make the gravy according to package directions, then add cranberry sauce, mustard and cream.
Stir gently to make sure all the meatballs are coated with sauce.
Cover and cook 4-5 hours on low or 2-3 hours on high.
To serve you can use a slotted spoon to remove the meatballs and put in a serving dish, or have folks just do it out of the crockpot.

You can add 1 t. cumin and 1/4 t. cayenne if you like.
This can also be used as a dinner served over rice or noodles.
